        Returns:
        the and supplier

      • or

        public static final Supplier<Boolean> or​(Supplier<Boolean>... clauses)
        Get a new supplier that returns true iff at least one true clause supplier exists.
        Parameters:
        clauses - the clause suppliers
        Returns:
        the or supplier

      • testInventoryCount

        public static final Supplier<Boolean> testInventoryCount​(Supplier<GreedyEntity> entityGetter,
                                                         Class<? extends CollectableEntity> collectableType,
                                                         Predicate<Integer> numberPredicate)
        Get a new supplier that checks the number of Collectables of type collectableType in the entity against the given number predicate.

        The entity getter will be called for every evaluation of the supplier. If the entity getter returns null the supplier returns false.

        Parameters:
        entityGetter - the getter for the entity to check the inventory of
        collectableType - the collectable type to check the number of
        numberPredicate - the predicate to check the collectable count against
        Returns:
        the created supplier

      • testCoinCount

        public static final Supplier<Boolean> testCoinCount​(Supplier<GreedyEntity> entityGetter,
                                                    Predicate<Integer> numberPredicate)
        Get a new supplier that checks the number of Collectables of type Coin in the entity against the given number predicate.

        The entity getter will be called for every evaluation of the supplier. If the entity getter returns null the supplier returns false.

        Parameters:
        entityGetter - the getter for the entity to check the inventory of
        numberPredicate - the predicate to check the collectable count against
        Returns:
        the created supplier

      • testEntitiesOnSameField

        public static final Supplier<Boolean> testEntitiesOnSameField​(Supplier<Entity> a,
                                                              Supplier<Entity> b)
        Get a new supplier that checks if two entities are on the same position.

        The entity getters will be called for every evaluation of the supplier. If any entity getter returns null the supplier returns false.

        If any of the entities is not on a playfield the supplier returns null.

        Parameters:
        a - the getter for entity a
        b - the getter for entity b
        Returns:
        the created supplier

      • testEntityOnField

        public static final Supplier<Boolean> testEntityOnField​(Supplier<Entity> entityGetter,
                                                        int x,
                                                        int y)
        Get a new supplier that checks if the entity is on the given position.

        The entity getter will be called for every evaluation of the supplier. If the entity getter returns null the supplier returns false.

        Parameters:
        entityGetter - the getter for the entity to check the inventory of
        x - coordinate
        y - coordinate
        Returns:
        the created supplier

      • testEntytyCountOnField

        public static final Supplier<Boolean> testEntytyCountOnField​(Playfield field,
                                                             Class<? extends Entity> entityType,
                                                             Predicate<Integer> numberPredicate,
                                                             int x,
                                                             int y)
        Get e new supplier that checks the number of Entites at Position(x, y) on the field against the given numberPredicate.
        Parameters:
        field - the playfield to check
        entityType - the entity type to look for (use {link Entity} to capture all entites)
        numberPredicate - the predicate to check the entity count against
        x - coordinate
        y - coordinate
        Returns:
        the new supplier
